venue.address_2: Exit 5A off Rt 128/93 in strip mall on left across from Comfort Inn
venue.name: Dunkin Donuts Randolph

item.description:
Meeting details to follow .......Need someone to lead this ride from our meeting location in Hingham to Dorchester.

Meet: Dunkin Donuts in Randolph
Time: 9 am -ride leaves at 930 am

************************************************
5th Annual
Cops For Kids With Cancer \"Flight of the Angels\"
August 29th (Sunday) Cops For Kids With Cancer “Flight of the Angels”

WHERE: Beginning at Florian Hall, Dorchester, Ma., with a scenic ride through the
south shore ending at the Hilltop Athletic Club, Kingston, Ma.

WHEN: August 29, 2010. Registration from 9:30 until 11:00. Ride leaves promptly at
11:00.

REGISTRATION: $20 per bike, additional rider $10. First 300 participants will
receive a t-shirt. Food and music will be provided.

Click here to learn more about Cops For Kids With Cancer
http://www.copsforkid...
for more information, bgj22@hotmail.com

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Cops for Kids with Cancer "Flight of the Angels" Ride
